name: Mozaick
tag_list: homepage, startpage, news, email, facebook, feed, rss
overview:
Mozaick is a fast-loading customizable startpage where you can read the News, your Emails, your Facebook feed and all that stuff.

Nowadays, we are overloaded with information and most of it is usually useless or uninteresting to us. It is therefore vital that Mozaick identifies and filters this information, and helps you separate relevant content from the rest.

Mozaick: how to handle the newsflow overload. â€¢ The interface aggregates information in a synthetic view, allowing you to read your newsflow at a glance â€¢ The best social network tools allow the community of users to suggest and confirm “buzzing” information, ranked with an innovative algorithm. â€¢ A special tab, shared by all users, shows breaking news and suggests new sources of information

What can you read in Mozaick? â€¢ Online newspaper articles â€¢ Videos (Youtube, Dailymotion, etc…) â€¢ Blogs â€¢ Emails (Gmail, Yahoo, Hotmail, etc…) â€¢ Social networks (Facebook, Twitter*,…) â€¢ Instant messengers â€¢ Search Google

Mozaick is targeting a mass market. The service is free and completely customizable according to everyone’s personal interests. The website loads instantly, making it a perfect homepage. Mozaick is a paneuropean company created between France and Finland funded by 3 friends.
